text: hello this is chef john from food which
is calm where they follow along
sourdough multiple-day multiple post
recipe so this is day one we're going to
make our starter so here's what I want
you to do and of course you're going to
rewind this and play it a few times but
take a cup of flour and a cup of warm
water in a plastic or glass container
and whisk it together this is what's
called the San Francisco sourdough
starter we're going to make bread
without yeast well that's not true we're
going to use these but we're gonna use
wild yeast that's in the air and it's in
the flour already what I'm using there
is just a regular bread flour and just
whisk it together it's going to look
kind of like a pancake batter we're
going to leave it out at room
temperature we're going to cover it with
a paper towel and a rubber band we want
air to get to it but we don't want any
you know critters in there so cover it
up you could just put the lid on kind of
loose if you wanted but I like the old
paper towel system you going to stir
that a couple times and just leave it
out for 24 hours and then you'll see the
next step you got to stay tuned this is
a multiple day multiple post follow
along recipe by the way a little tip
here when you're buying bread flour I
like the kind that's great for bread
making anyway check out the site for the
post and more info and hopefully you're
going to follow along it should be fun
and by next week we're gonna have some
bread enjoy
